page.title: 06Pop Music
page.content: Most young people like pop music but parents often complain about what their children listen to. It is the fashion these days to walk about the street with a large portable stereo cassette player. More often than not the volume is at full blast and that annoys quite a lot of adults. Although many people criticize pop artists for various reasons recently many musicians have helped raise a great deal of money for charity. In London a concert has been held to raise cash for famine relief in Africa. Millions of pounds have been given in by the public. Most people in this area watched at least part of this concert on T.V. There are no record shops in Winterbourne the nearest one being several miles away. When local people want to see live pop music they have to go to the Colston Hall in Bristol.
